WorkItem.Description:
Sorry for my english.

I have a problem with PHPExcel_ReferenceHelper, updateFormulaReferences 

I need to copy the formulas containing references to data in cells on other sheets. For example 
='list1'!A1+'list2'!Z1-'list3'!B1 . 
 I use to update links "updateFormulaReferences()", but it does not work if the formulas contain references to other worksheets .... if daring 'list1'! from formula - it works fine ..
What do I do? How to update the formulas containing references to other sheets list1'!
WorkItem.Summary: Copy formulas with references on other worksheets
